app_descript:
App Name: Deliveroo
Package Name: com.deliveroo.orderapp

Brief:
Deliveroo offers a convenient, versatile food delivery experience that caters to your immediate cravings or planned meals. With an array of options from your preferred cuisines, diet-specific dishes, or favorite restaurants, Deliveroo ensures that your order is just a few taps away. Equipped with customer-friendly features such as order scheduling, queue skipping, and real-time food tracking, the app simplifies your dining experience.
